Package dev.schoolmanagement.service.concrete

Class CourseServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
dev.schoolmanagement.service.concrete.CourseServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseService<CourseDTO>, CourseService
@Service @Transactional(readOnly=true) public class CourseServiceImpl extends Object implements CourseService
CourseService implementation class. All of its methods are declared readOnly at class level, writing methods are excluded by @Transactional annotation.
Author:
Erhan Cavdar.

    • checkVacancyStatus

      public boolean checkVacancyStatus​(Long courseId)
      Finds the course by the given ID and checks if the number of students associated with the found course is bigger then 20. If it is bigger, throws StudentNumberForOneCourseExceededException exception.
      Specified by:
      checkVacancyStatus in interface CourseService
      Parameters:
      courseId - of the queried course.
      Returns:
      true or false according to the result
